entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
